entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
